data.scheme_name: IT and ITeS Policy of Uttar Pradesh 2022 - Capital Subsidy - Existing
data.benefits: • Scheme provides capital subsidy at the rate of 10% on the incremental Fixed Capital Investment (FCI), subject to a maximum subsidy of Rs 5000 lakhs to the eligible IT/ITeS units.
data.eligibility: • Expansion units with a minimum incremental fixed capital (which qualifies as eligible FCI towards expansion of unit) of Rs 200 lakhs.
data.conditions: • Eligible FCI Time limit for commencement of commercial operations Upto Rs 20000 lakhs:- 4 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC). Greater than Rs 20000 lakhs but less than Rs 100000 lakhs:- 5 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC). Greater than Rs 100000 lakhs:- 7 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC).
data.beneficiaries: • Expansion units with a minimum incremental fixed capital (which qualifies as eligible FCI towards expansion of unit) of Rs 200 lakhs.
data.prerequisites: • Eligible FCI Time limit for commencement of commercial operations Upto Rs 20000 lakhs:- 4 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC). Greater than Rs 20000 lakhs but less than Rs 100000 lakhs:- 5 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC). Greater than Rs 100000 lakhs:- 7 years from the date of issuance of Letter of Comfort (LoC).
data.context: • The Uttar Pradesh government is transforming itself into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy, thereby paving its way to become a dream destination for investments in line with its goal to become a $1 trillion economy by 2027.
data.objective: • The policy aims to build a robust ecosystem for the sector by enabling a sound business environment and by encouraging collaboration and consolidation towards creating a technological shift in the state through establishment of IT Cities, IT Parks and Centers of Excellence in emerging technologies such as AI, Blockchain, Big data, Cloud computing and IoT.
data.description: • Expansion units with a minimum incremental fixed capital (which qualifies as eligible FCI towards expansion of unit) of Rs 200 lakhs shall be eligible to claim the following incentives - Eligible expansion units will be eligible to claim capital subsidy at the rate of 10% on the incremental Fixed Capital Investment (FCI), subject to a maximum subsidy of Rs 5000 lakhs to the eligible IT/ITeS units.
data.how_to_apply: • The Applicant can apply through Integrated Single Window Platform for IT & and ITES under one roof for time - bound clearances:http://itpolicyup.gov.in/application - forms - iip - registration - form/
data.funding_mechanism: • The disbursal shall be done in annual installments over five years post commencement of commercial operations and each annual installment shall not exceed Rs.1000 lakhs.
